name: GreenScream - Go Fight Yourself
description:
GreenScreen fighting game made in Unity 5.5.1, at AGDS Jam 2017.

Controls:

Left Analog Stick - Left/Right movement. (P1 a/d, P2 j/k)

B - Kick (P1 W, P2 I)

A - Punch (P1 Q, P2 U)

Press A to progress through menu to Character Creation

Press X or Mouse 1 to take photo of player (In order: Idle, Block, Punch, Kick)

Press A again to FIGHT!

GO FIGHT YOURSELF!
